Type.Name: OutOfMemoryException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit OutOfMemoryException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when insufficient memory prevents the current memory allocation from succeeding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "There was not enough memory to continue the execution of the program." This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: public rtspecialname specialname instance void .ctor(string message)
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using . If is , the property is initialized to the system-supplied message provided by the constructor that takes no arguments. The property is initialized to .
